description: Are you getting the right protection from your pad? Using the wrong pad size can lead to leaks. Step up in size to help stop leaks. Now you can find your fit with Always® MY FIT, a tailored sizing system to help you find the best protection based on both your flow AND panty size. Use the sizing chart in the images to find your fit for day and night. For daytime protection, Always Ultra Thin, Size 2, Super Pads With Flexi-Wings have a flexible design that moves with you, plus a LeakGuard Core that absorbs in seconds for up to 8 hours of protection.
title: Always Ultra Thin Size 2 Super Pads With Wings - Unscented

description: Nighttime leaks can be a nightmare! Sleep easy knowing your prettiest p.j.'s will always look like a dream with Always® Radiant Overnight pads. Light, flexible Always Radiant Overnight pads are up to 100% leak-free, so you can wear what you want, any night. Always Radiant Overnight pads are made with FlexFoam that absorbs 10X its weight, which means they've got your back all night long-up to 10 hours. And they're so thin and flexible, you might forget it's even there. Always Radiant Overnight pads also have fierce, fun patterns, designed to be almost as stylish as you are. And their new, better-than-ever wing adhesive means they'll be sure to stay put. So don't lose sleep over leaks! Stay confident all night long in Always Radiant Overnight pads. 100% leak-free periods are possible with Always® Radiant pads. Fabulous FlexFoam absorbs 10X its weight for protection you'll forget is even there. A pad that's almost as stylish as you are, designed with fierce, fun prints. This mighty pad has got your back-up to 10 hours of worry-free protection. Stay-put protection with better-than-ever wing adhesive. Feel fresh all night long with a light, floral scent. Always Radiant pads are available in regular, heavy, and overnight absorbencies.
title: Always Radiant Overnight with Wings Flex Foam Scented Pads

bullets: Scented overnight pads are easy to wear with any pajamas
Flex Foam pads absorb 10x their weight for ultimate protection
Up to 10 hours of worry-free protection for comfortable sleeping
Overnight pads with flexible wings for a sure, secure fit

And they're so thin and flexible, you might forget it's even there. Always Radiant pads also have fierce, fun patterns, designed to be almost as stylish as you are. And their new, better-than-ever wing adhesive means they'll be sure to stay put. So grab that little black dress and stay confident all day long in Always Radiant pads. 100% leak-free periods are possible with Always® Radiant pads.
